channel.title: Need help with monsters
channel.description: to add a new monster u need to to set the health so when u attack it it diesnt lag and log u out but if i set health i cant get in i just keep getting connection lost...what do i do??? :(

item.title: Need help with monsters
item.dc:creator: @krawks12 krawks12
item.description:
@krawks12 wrote:

still need help bc it still freezes when i try to log in to my server…and also if i dont add hp to the monster it works fine as long as i dont atk…and i added drops but it made no dif[br][size=1]Posted at: July 30, 2006, 04:31:56 AM[/size][hr]any1 no whats wrong???[br][size=1]Posted at: July 30, 2006, 12:12:54 PM[/size][hr]ok seeing as it wont let me add any monsters i tried to change whant the guards drop and added the whip with 100% drop and now its doin the same thing…im usin hybridscape if it matters…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with monsters
item.dc:creator: @rat_dog rat dog
item.description:
@rat_dog wrote:

It pretty much explains it self, just look at the header while adding in the ints:
----------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount

DropTypes:
0 = 100% Drop.
1-5 = Randomly Picked.

Read full topic
